## Type of Change

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to change)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Refactoring (no functional changes)

## Checklist

- [ ] My code compiles without new warnings (`make` with `-Wall`)
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation
- [ ] I have tested with at least one PCAP file to verify no regressions
- [ ] My changes do not introduce memory leaks (tested with valgrind if applicable)

- [ ] Live capture testing
- [ ] Configuration parameter testing
